Title: January 2022
Content: *p69507a02032*20  *(iii)a series of tests was performed on compounda.testobservation1addition of phosphorus(v) chloridemisty fumes2addition of 2,4dinitrophenylhydrazineorange precipitate3addition of benedicts or fehlings reagentsolution remains blue with no precipitate4addition ofacidified potassium dichromate(vi)solution remains orange5test using polarimetryplane of plane polarised light is rotateddeduce the structure for compounda. justify your answer by using all the test results.(6)
